description: Numbers that are primitively or imprimitively represented by x^2+xy+y^2, but not both.
comments: a(n) = A198772(n) for n <= 32. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 30 2011
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) prim(f)=for(i=1, #f~, if(f[i, 1]%3!=1 && (f[i, 1]!=3 || f[i, 2]>1), return(factorback(f)==0))); 1imprim(f)=my(t); for(i=1, #f~, if(f[i, 1]%3<2 && f[i, 2]>1, t=1); if(f[i, 1]%3==2, if(f[i, 2]%2, return(0), t=1))); tis(n)=my(f=factor(n)); prim(f)+imprim(f)==1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 04 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
